```{r}

#rmultinom(n = 2, c(1,2,3,4,5), rep(1/5,5))
rmults <- function(n, size, prob) {
  size = size[1]
  prob = prob[1]
  apply(rmultinom(n = n, 1:size, rep(prob, size))==1, 2, which)

}
rmults(2, c(5,5), c(1/5,1/5))
```

```{r}


library(simcausal)
D <- DAG.empty()
D <- D +
  node("W1", distr = "rmults", size = 15 , prob = 1/15) +
  node("W", distr = "rconst", const = W1 + 1) +
  node("S", distr = "rnorm",  mean =   sqrt(8), sd = 1) +
  node("Y", distr = "rbinom", size =1 , prob = plogis((S^2 + W) /30))

setD <- set.DAG(D)
dat <- sim(setD, n = 2000)
dat

```

```{r}
findInterval(1.6,c(1,2,3))

```



```{r}
dat <- as.data.table(dat)
cutoffs <- quantile(dat$S, seq(0.02, .98, .05))
listofdata <- list()
cutoffs
t = 0
for (cutoff in cutoffs){
  dat1 <- copy(dat)
  dat1$v <- cutoff
  dat1$A <- as.numeric(dat1$S >= cutoff)
  dat1$t <- 0
  listofdata[[as.character(cutoff)]] <- dat1
   dat1$t <- 0
}

data <- rbindlist(listofdata)
data$id <- data$ID
data$ID <- NULL
```

```{r}
npsem <- list(define_node("W", "W", c()),
              define_node("A", "A", c("W")),
               define_node("v", "v", c(), time = unique(data$t)),
              define_node("Y", "Y", c("A", "W", "v"), time = unique(data$t))
              )
task <- tmle3_Task$new(data, npsem, id = "id", time = "t" )
```


```{r}
dat
cutoffs <- quantile(dat$S, seq(0.3,.4,length.out=4))
npsem <- list(define_node("W", "W", c()),
              define_node("S", "S", c("W")),
              define_node("Y", "Y", c("S", "W"))
              )
task <- tmle3_Task$new(dat, npsem)
task$data
factor_list <- list(LF_emp$new("W"), LF_fit$new("S", Lrnr_CDF$new(make_learner(Lrnr_glm, family = binomial()), 10, cutoffs), type = "mean"), LF_fit$new("Y", Lrnr_thresh$new(make_learner(Lrnr_glm, family = binomial()), "S", cutoffs =cutoffs ), type = "mean"))
likelihood <- Likelihood$new(factor_list)
likelihood <- likelihood$train(task)
```

```{r}
param <- Param_thresh$new(likelihood, cutoffs)
as.data.table(param$clever_covariates(task)$Y)
```
